src:
【富二代露鳥57秒2】家門口露鳥57秒　周興哲哥哥「完事」還狂抖動
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by 娛樂組, 攝影組
本刊直擊，周興哲跟他哥哥周予天在街上大吵就算了，尤其後來喝得很醉的周予天還隨地便溺，而且都快到家了，還是忍不住在門前大肆解放膀胱，全程共57秒。



只見周予天的右手還公然握著鳥鳥甩，「小小天」尿出好大一片的尿漬；陳奕則全程在後欣賞上述難得一見的風景。
詳細的過程是這樣子的：到了凌晨接近3點一群人終於回到住處，2輛代駕的保時捷都已停到了停車場，周興哲駕駛的保時捷則在路邊放人下車，原本同行的女生都已不見，消失在夜色之中。








隨即周興哲也離開，完美地幫哥哥收拾善後，正當以為周予天和陳奕也要離開時，明明已經到家樓下的周予天突然在路邊就地解放，陳奕似乎習以為常卻又全程緊盯，在朋友身後守護著他，畫面有些許感人。
只見周予天一副忍耐了很久的樣子，所以那泡尿撒得又臭又長，全程將近57秒，快結束的時候，他還握著自己的「小小天」甩了又甩，抖動得有點厲害，接著還抬腳檢查有沒有噴到自己的球鞋。








公然露鳥後，周予天還不心滿意足，硬要把看他尿尿的陳奕送到路口，這一切才劃下句點；可見周予天也沒啥包袱，相當自然地從事以上種種失控行徑，加上四下也無人，所以不怕被人用異樣的眼光看待。

★《鏡週刊》關心您：未滿18歲禁止飲酒，飲酒過量害人害己，酒後不開車，安全有保障。

更新時間｜2019.11.05 11:44
text:
[Fu two generations of dew birds 57 seconds 2] home door exposed birds 57 seconds Zhou Xingzhe brother "finished" is still shaking
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by Entertainment Group, Photography Group
In this journal, Zhou Xingzhe and his brother Zhou Yutian had a big fight on the street, especially Zhou Yutian, who was drunk and drunk, and they were all at home, and couldn’t help but liberate the bladder in front of the door for a total of 57 seconds.



I saw Zhou Yutian’s right hand still holding the bird and bird cockroaches. “Little Xiaotian” urinated a large amount of urine stains; Chen Hao was enjoying the rare scenery mentioned above.
The detailed process is like this: At about 3 o'clock in the morning, a group of people finally returned to their residences. Two Porsche drivers have stopped at the parking lot. The Porsche driving Zhou Xingzhe puts people off the road. The girls who have been with them have already Not seen, disappeared into the night.








Then Zhou Xingzhe also left, perfectly helping his brother to clean up, just when Zhou Yutian and Chen Yu were leaving, Ming Zhoutian, who had already arrived at the downstairs, suddenly liberated on the roadside. Chen Hao seems to be used to it, but he keeps his eyes on it. The friend guards him behind him, and the picture is a little touching.
I saw Zhou Yutian being patient for a long time, so the pissing was stinky and long, and the whole journey was nearly 57 seconds. At the end of the day, he also held his own "little day" and snorted and shook a little. Severe, then lifted his foot to check if there was any sneakers sprayed on his own.








After publicly revealing the birds, Zhou Yutian was still not satisfied, and he had to send Chen Yu, who was looking at his pee, to the intersection. All this was down to the end; it can be seen that Zhou Yutian did not have any burdens, quite naturally engaged in all kinds of uncontrollable acts, plus four. There are no people underneath, so I am not afraid of being treated with a different look.
